name: New HIV Disease
description: HIV patients for whom WHO Classification advanced to 3 or 4
sql:
SELECT person_id
FROM obs
WHERE
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(obs_datetime) > :lastExecutionTime
  AND
  (
    concept_id = :CIEL_5356
    AND value_coded in
      (
        :CIEL_1206,
        :CIEL_1207,
        :CIEL_1222,
        :CIEL_1223
      )
  AND not voided;
